__TOC__

        
* Contact: <nowiki>[[vlandi]]</nowiki>
* Make: Packard Bell
* Brand: EasyNote
* Model: A7718
* Website: http://support.packardbell.com/uk/item/index.php?m=home&pn=PB20R00001

=== Current Issues ===

* ACPI doesn't work in Dapper. In Breezy works well.
* Screen resolution needs to be fixed using 855resolution (and change gdm to start later)
* Modem doesn't work without drivers from http://www.linuxant.com (HSF)
* Wi-Fi module needs file /etc/modprobe.d/ipw2200.modprobe with "options ipw2200 led=1" to make WiFi LED work
* Card reader works with driver from: http://developer.berlios.de/projects/tifmxx

=== Hardware details ===
* Pentium M 750 1,7 GHz
* 512 Mb RAM
* 80 Gb HDD
* CD/DVD-RW Combo
* 13,3" TFT WXGA 1280x768
* Texas Instruments PCIxx21 4-in-1 card reader
* Intel 855GM VGA card
* Intel ipw2200 Wi-Fi card
* Realtek 8139 LAN card
* Intel 82801 AC'97 Audio
* Connexant AC'97 Modem
